name: Code-snippets
tagline: A repository with helpful programming resources for SparkPost developers.
body: [Sign up](https://app.sparkpost.com/sign-up?src=Dev-Website&sfdcid=70160000000pqBb) for a SparkPost account and visit our [Developer Hub](https://developers.sparkpost.com) for even more content. # SparkPost Code Snippets A repository with helpful programming resources for SparkPost developers. ## [Code Snippets](/snippets) These code snippets provide examples for possible solutions using SparkPost. ## [cURL Examples](/cURL) This is a library of cURL examples for testing or debugging SparkPost API requests.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
